item.title: The Six-Minute Interview
item.author: paige.watson@softwareascraft.com (Paige)
item.description: First, the “Why” This interview challenge is based on the six minute interview created by Llewellyn Falco. The idea behind this challenge is not to have the candidate solve the challenge, but to get an idea of whether the candidate understands certain principles of development. After 6 minutes, you should be able to answer several questions, with the most important being: Do I want to see more from this candidate?
